item.title: Is Artificial Intelligence Dangerous?
item.description: Artificial Intelligence, or AI for short, seems like the latest trend in the technology industry. Everyone wants to hop on board and start researching and working on this new hip trend. However, the industry is divided on its regulations. item.title: WannaCry Ransomware
item.description: Recent ransomware dubbed “WannaCry” has brought many computers down to its knees. Let’s take a look at the essentials and how to protect yourself from a worm like this in the future. item.title: American Health Care Act?

item.title: Automate All the Things!
item.description: Recently, a co-worker of mine exposed me to this wonderful thing called Google Apps Scripts, another one of Google’s languages (this one perhaps more useful). item.title: Phishing Done Right
item.description: Oh boy, today I got a notification from New York University’s Chief Information Officer about a phishing scam happening to many universities nation wide, I was both concerned and excited. In order for such a phishing campaign to be successful and got past most difficulties, it must be well designed!...

item.title: Welcome to the Thought Bubble!
item.description: Every idea has to start somewhere, and mine will start here… What is this? This is where I share my ideas, current concerns about the world, or my general wonderment.
